name: milo-dog
description: A massively over-engineered website about a small sausage dog, Milo.
author: Nico Castro

scripts.run-test:development:api: docker-compose -f 'dev.docker-compose.yml' build apiTest && docker-compose -f 'dev.docker-compose.yml' run apiTest yarn test
scripts.run-test:production:api: docker-compose -f 'prod.docker-compose.yml' build apiTest && docker-compose -f 'prod.docker-compose.yml' run apiTest yarn test
scripts.start:development: docker-compose -f 'dev.docker-compose.yml' config --services | grep -v 'Test' | xargs docker-compose -f 'dev.docker-compose.yml' up
scripts.start:production: docker-compose -f 'prod.docker-compose.yml' config --services | grep -v 'Test' | xargs docker-compose -f 'prod.docker-compose.yml' up
